dict.acceptation: 频道，波道；渠道；途径；海峡；

sent.orig: Coercer: Channel-No longer distributes power from dead players in the group. Damage reduced.
sent.trans: Coer:Channel,与队友分配能量时，将不再把已死亡的玩家列入计算，造成的伤害降低。

sent.orig: The channel management mainly includes two aspects: channel control and channel stimulation.
sent.trans: 渠道管理主要抓住两个重要的方面：渠道控制和渠道激励。

sent.orig: The Yangtze River bridges of Shanghai include navigation channel, navigation channel and non-navigation channel.
sent.trans: 上海长江大桥包括主、辅通航孔桥和非通航孔桥。

sent.orig: The auxiliary channels have one digital voice channel, one EOW channel and one data channel.
sent.trans: 辅助信道拥有一个数字音频信道、一个EOW通道和一个数据通道。

sent.orig: The covert channel can be divided into two types: simple covert channel and complex covert channel.
sent.trans: 在研究隐蔽通道的检测方法时，可以将隐蔽通道分成两大类：单一隐蔽通道和复合隐蔽通道。
